title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO DONATE TO THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (DEPED) REPRESENTED BY THE SCHOOL DIVISION SUPERINTENDENT EDITHA M. ATENDIDO 4,975.7 SQUARE METERS OF THE LAND LOCATED IN BARANGAY MAYONDON, LOS BANOS, LAGUNA PURCHASED AND OWNED BY THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS AND PRESENTLY BEING UTILIZED BY THE LOS BANOS INTEGRATED SCHOOLS (LBIS) AND RATIFYING THE SAME THEREAFTER.
